com.esri.mo2.file.shp
Class DbfField

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.file.shp.DbfField
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DbfCharacterField, DbfDateField, DbfLogicalField, DbfMemoField, DbfNumericField
public abstract class DbfField
extends Object
implements Cloneable

This class is the superclass for all dBASE fields. It contains the members and methods that will be common to all subclasses.

checkUnderflow

protected void checkUnderflow(byte[] buffer,
                              byte[] b,
                              int jst,
                              char c)
Writes output value to the buffer after making the appropriate adjustments to justify the value within the fields buffer.

Parameters:
buffer - output buffer
b - output value
jst - justification 0=left, 1=right
c - fill character

checkOverflow

protected boolean checkOverflow(byte[] buffer,
                                byte[] b)
Checks length of output value to determine if it exceeds the width of the field. If so, it will completely fill the field value with asterisks which indicates that the value overflowed.

Parameters:
buffer - output record buffer
b - output value
Returns:
true if the length of the output value exceeds the width of the field

isSpaces

protected boolean isSpaces(String s)
Determines if the string is filled with spaces.

Parameters:
s - string to scan
Returns:
true if the string only contains spaces
